text: Maga viryala amhi jamalelya raktace svarupa dile, maga tya raktacya golyala mansaca tukada banivale, maga mansacya tukadyata hade banivali, maga hadanvara mansa jadhavile, maga eka dusarya svarupata tyala nirmana kele. Tevha motha samrd'dhasali ahe to allaha jo sarvottama nirmiti karanara ahe
